rows.label: qst201404_msg0001
rows.name:
Nia! Just the person!
You're right on time!

rows.label: qst201404_msg0002
rows.name:
Hey, Zakuro and Hikari! What do you
mean by that? Dare I even ask...?

rows.label: qst201404_msg0003
rows.name:
We're having a showdown. We want
to determine who's got the most
Girl Power. A Gossip Circle.

rows.label: qst201404_msg0004
rows.name:
Ah...that... So you're going
ahead with it for real?

rows.label: qst201404_msg0005
rows.name: Just...take a seat here, will you?

rows.label: qst201404_msg0006
rows.name:
And now tell us! Who has the most
Girl Power? Hikari...or me?

rows.label: qst201404_msg0007
rows.name:
You want me to... Uhm...I
guess it's fine. I have time.

rows.label: qst201404_msg0008
rows.name: Okay. Let's get to it.

rows.label: qst201404_msg0009
rows.name:
But, how are you going to
take each other on exactly?

rows.label: qst201404_msg0010
rows.name:
Well, we thought we'd try girl talk first.
Just tell us who's got the most girly talk,
in terms of content and delivery.

rows.label: qst201404_msg0035
rows.name: Got it.

rows.label: qst201404_msg0034
rows.name:
So...for the first topic...uhm...
It's a bit basic, but how
about 'favorite food'?

rows.label: qst201404_msg0011
rows.name:
Yeah! Sounds good! Let's
get started at last!

rows.label: qst201404_msg0036
rows.name:
So Nia, tell me. What is
your favorite food exactly?

rows.label: qst201404_msg0012
rows.name: Oh. I'm on the spot now!

rows.label: qst201404_msg0013
rows.name: I guess...Cream Orange Paratha!

rows.label: qst201404_msg0014
rows.name:
Oh really? I didn't think you'd
have such adorable tastes!

rows.label: qst201404_msg0015
rows.name: I don't care. I just eat stuff I like.

rows.label: qst201404_msg0016
rows.name:
I'm just surprised, that's all.
I thought you'd be more of a
meat and fish sort of girl.

rows.label: qst201404_msg0037
rows.name: Ah, no, that's a bit boring for me.

rows.label: qst201404_msg0017
rows.name: So. Nia. I'd like to ask you something.

rows.label: qst201404_msg0018
rows.name: Fill your boots.

rows.label: qst201404_msg0019
rows.name:
What do you think of Byakko?
I mean...as a man...cat...?
Cat-man? Man-cat...

rows.label: qst201404_msg0020
rows.name:
H-hey?! Where did that come from?
I thought we were talking about
food? That's so...weird...

rows.label: qst201404_msg0038
rows.name:
But when girls get
together...this is the stuff
we REALLY want to know, Nia.

rows.label: qst201404_msg0039
rows.name:
This kind of girls-only
banter is an important
component of Girl Power, Nia.

rows.label: qst201404_msg0021
rows.name:
Oh...no...I erm...wasn't just trying
to win or anything like that. I'm
just really interested in you, Nia!

rows.label: qst201404_msg0022
rows.name:
Like, he's always following you around
like "My lady, my lady!" and I just
kinda thought, what's up with that?

rows.label: qst201404_msg0024
rows.name:
Well, honestly, I don't
really give it much thought.

rows.label: qst201404_msg0025
rows.name:
He awakened, and just started
talking to me like that. So what?

rows.label: qst201404_msg0026
rows.name:
But, I mean...you must have
noticed that he's a man...or,
uhm...male, I mean.

rows.label: qst201404_msg0027
rows.name:
We're kind of joined at the hip. But
that just makes me think of him as
a butler or parent or something.

rows.label: qst201404_msg0028
rows.name:
He's a bit of a nag
sometimes. But he's just
looking out for me, y'know?

rows.label: qst201404_msg0029
rows.name: ...HEY! Why am I telling you all this?

rows.label: qst201404_msg0030
rows.name: Enough! I'm going to my room!

rows.label: qst201404_msg0031
rows.name: Aww... It was just getting good!

rows.label: qst201404_msg0032
rows.name:
The judge walked out... I
guess this one's a draw.

rows.label: qst201404_msg0033
rows.name:
Yeah, agreed. Okay.
Let's try another bout.
